metadata.dc:title: Segmental neurofibromatosis - case report
metadata.dc:description: A 62-year-old woman, caucasian, presented asymptomatic and isolated nodules on the trunk. The diagnosis of segmental neurofibromatosis wasmade on the basis of clinical and histopathology features (AU)
metadata.dc:creator: Zanini, M
metadata.dc:title: Neurofibromatose segmentar - relato de un caso
